name: Dearest You
description:
One day, you find an unmarked letter in your mailbox. Who could it be from? And what will you do about it?

My submission for the O2A2 2021 jam. This was a fun challenge with very tight constraints!

  • Playtime 5-10 minutes
  • Two possible endings
  • Uses the OpenDyslexic font

Contains anxiety. 

Comments are appreciated and Let's Plays are welcome!
